data.text:
December is here and so is the latest Baltic Outlook - available on board of our flights! In this issue fall in love with the city of Amsterdam, a destination that embodies beauty and art. 🎨
Discover this and other exciting stories on board and online: https://t.co/0HxWNrwlCE https://t.co/jidgHnOZRH

data.text: #DidYouKnow that FDM (Flight Data Monitoring) system on @Airbus A220 records few hundred parameters of aircraft during the flight (such as control surface positions, engine parameters, as well others) and every flight can be re-played using special software afterwards? https://t.co/miduilp1la
Catching snowflakes ❄️ and flights ✈️ https://t.co/LiH5OtWKPy

We are glad to announce that as of late November 2021, we have taken over passenger handling and flight coordinator duties at @Riga_Airport with our own staff. Read more: https://t.co/Tz4ktnjuAh https://t.co/zX7TsyUrMZ

urls.title: Delayed, lost or damaged baggage | Baggage Rules | airBaltic
urls.description: To ensure the soonest possible tracing and delivery, delayed baggage should be reported immediately after the flight.

data.text: @BanKsEsports Good morning! Our apologies for such unpleasant situation with the baggage. If you have already declared this at the airport’s Lost & Found office upon arrival, you should be contacted once the bags can be delivered to you. More details about procedure: https://t.co/pDmf3gcMZN

data.text: airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! 🔔 Edition 7 NFTs are showcasing Jelgava #cryptoart and have been issued on the @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. A total of 10 new unique collectibles can be purchased now: https://t.co/vZ5kSxl2g7 https://t.co/GX0spfFvDk

Thank you for participating! Majority said we have 17 codeshare partners, but do we? 🤔
airBaltic currently has 24 codeshare partners which offer our passengers a broader route network and better connectivity! 😏 Be sure to check all the possibilities on our website!

data.text: @GalaxyJudge That's a great view while enjoying the coffee!
@MadarsRazma See you on board then in the next... 2 flights... and many more in the future! 🎯💚
@therigaspotter An amazing shot! Thanks for sharing!

Thank you for participating! We have a lot of detail oriented followers! The aircraft that had the best time being showcased at the Dubai airshow was indeed our YL-ABF! ✈️ Here’s to many more adventures! 💚
@BrunoPint041 It really is! 💚
Drop your best window seat pics ⛅ We'll go first. https://t.co/sVSMFhKqPG

@LigaFlower Labvakar! Atvainojamies par šo situāciju. Vai varam lūgt privātajā ziņā sīkākas detaļas par Jūsu rezervāciju?
Tāpat informējam, ka ar mums iespējams sazināties zvanot no visas pasaules un izmantojot starptautisko tālruņa līniju: +371 6700 6006
@PienaZupa Labvakar! Vai varētu lūdzu atsūtīt visas rezervācijas detaļas, kas Jums pieejamas DM ziņā? Centīsimies palīdzēt! 😊

@sysman_j Hello! Apologies for the small delay! If you are in Amsterdam and flying with us either to Vilnius or Tallinn, according to information we have, you should be up in the air in the next 15 to 20 minutes. Thanks for your understanding and enjoy the flight!

#airBalticQuiz tiime! We’ve been keeping busy (and proud) participating in #DAS 🇦🇪
Our newest addition to the family has traveled far and wide to be showcased in Dubai. Have you noticed which of our #A220 is in the air show? ✈️ 
Pssst, it’s our 32nd aircraft if that helps 👀

@neirOZO Lidojumi uz/no Budapeštas tiek veikti 3x nedēļā un tie mājaslapas kalendārā atzīmēti ar zilu trijstūri. Ja Jūsu vēlamajā dienā tiešā reisa nav, aicinām izvēlēties lidojumu citā dienā (kurā ir tiešais reiss), vai lidojumus sadarbībā ar mūsu partneraviokompānijām.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @neirOZO Biļetes konkrētajos datumos var iegādāties dodoties uz mūsu mājaslapu https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg - kā jau vairākkārtēji atbildējām, lidojumus šajā maršrutā nodrošinām ar marta beigām, tātad arī Lieldienās!
@liinaps Hello! Thank you for the question! Please note that check-in, as well as bag drop opens 2 hours before flight departure time.
The idea of freedom and independence was once just a dream. Forever proud to carry the Latvian flag across the sky! 🇱🇻 https://t.co/RpDEez6Efe
@neirOZO Paldies par ekrānšāviņu! Kā jau minējām, sākot ar marta beigām, tiešie reisi ir pieejami gan uz, gan no Budapeštas. https://t.co/ZGvz6H0rgN
@neirOZO Vai varam lūgt atsūtīt ekrānšāviņu ar tiešo lidojumu, ko mūsu sistēma piedāvā iegādāties šajā maršrutā laikā līdz nākamā gada martam?
@neirOZO Labvakar! Paldies par jautājumu. Lidojuma grafiku ietekmē daudz un dažādi apstākļi. Šobrīd tiešos lidojumus konkrētajā maršrutā plānojam atsākt 2022.gada martā! Paldies!

Godinām un atbalstām mūsu sportistus, kuri nes Latvijas vārdu pasaulē! 🇱🇻 airBaltic aicina tevi novērtēt sportistu izcilos sasniegumus, piedaloties Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas tautas balsojumā: https://t.co/AvsEKMWNB4 Balsot iespējams katru dienu līdz pat 28. novembrim. https://t.co/myGGyWjAx1

urls.title: Trīs Zvaigžņu Balva – Balso par savu favorītu deviņās nominācijās! – Trīs Zvaigžņu Balva – Balso par savu favorītu deviņās nominācijās!
urls.description: ‘Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas’ svinīgā ceremonija notiks 2023.gada 14.janvārī. ‘Trīs Zvaigžņu balvas’ svinīgā ceremonija notiks 2023.gada 14.janvārī. Mēs izmantojam sīkdatnes, lai nodrošinātu labāku mājas lapas lietošanas pieredzi.

data.text: @gGiperbal Hi! We accept different cryptocurrencies, like Bitcoin Cash, Ether and Dogecoin among others for bookings made on our website.
@sleyheron Thanks for the compliment, glad you enjoyed the flight! See you on board again in the future! ❤️
@KierseyDaniel Hello! May we ask, what is the issue, Kiersey? Please note that you may also DM us privatey if not following us! Thank you!

Welcome to #airBalticQuiz! Making content for our followers is one of the best parts of social media team work! 💚
We have been growing and coming up with new ideas on various platforms. What’s the latest social media network airBaltic has joined and been verified in? ✓

Tomorrow November 11th, CEO @Gaussm and SVP HR Alīna Roščina of airBaltic will be joining @simple_flying and AviaDev Future Flying Forum to discuss the airline's experience promoting and maintaining gender diversity in the company. Learn more: https://t.co/XZB0uDF2iu https://t.co/uEsraemtoT

data.text: Have you used #cryptocurrency to book flight tickets? During the third quarter of 2021, the number of bookings paid with crypto currencies increased by 44% compared to the same period last year. Since 2014, more than 1000 clients have used the service. https://t.co/ppTzAvykDr https://t.co/VtTbB1QaUF

urls.title: Travelling with pets | airBaltic
urls.description: Find useful information on making the journey comfortable for your pet (and for your peace of mind).

data.text:
Things can only go up from here 🛫

📸 @dslr_spotting https://t.co/3YU51sEkF6

@ulischwarzrot The other two options in this case were created by our social media team specifically for the quiz. However there were many values and their descriptions evaluated and looked at on focus groups!

Thank you for participating! These revised values were found in a survey among customers, colleagues, opinion leaders and partners. 

We deliver. We care. We grow. 💚

Working above the clouds – isn’t that great? 🌤 We caught our flying coworker Dženeta on the ground and got a chance to ask her a few questions about her life as a cabin crew. If you dream about taking your career to new heights, join us: https://t.co/7alKVghoAS https://t.co/WEjkjDBkuL

Welcome back to another #airBalticQuiz! Everyone needs values by which they move towards fulfilling their goals and mission.💚 
If you have been closely following our story, you will know that our values are:

data.text: Although in aviation autumn months usually mean smaller traffic figures, it is different this year. For the first time ever, we carried more passengers in October than September - 240 300 passengers or 232% more than during the same period last year. https://t.co/2EXBiDssSI https://t.co/xFgKQ0UWSr
@Elloheart Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know we have already replied to your private message.

@KorpivaaraR You are totally correct, Riitta!
Cannot wait to start the flights! ❄️

Today we have published our flight schedule for the upcoming summer season that will begin on March 22, 2022. We plan to connect Riga with more than 70 destinations across our network: https://t.co/J2vzKV0vfo https://t.co/qs1SksG1VQ

Each of us has to take steps to make everyday life safe – one of them is wearing a face mask in public. We kindly ask our passengers to act responsibly and wear a face mask during the whole flight to protect their and fellow travelers’ health. https://t.co/C8rHBA3R1i
@naomiaustin There's a lot of going on here, that's for sure! Quite possibly this could be Scotland? 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🤔
@Lana77903529 That's a hard one, Lana. We will ask for another emoji!
@SPOTBAT Well, it looks like your next destination is definitely in South America! 😉
@karlisvorslovs Let’s go! ✈️ https://t.co/LwVyW4x3uo

@BaibaNorlinde Baiba, is here more than one destination? We seem a bit lost 😲
@velo_bristol Well, there are 6 possible options... 😏

data.text:
Whether you are a sworn sun lover or a dedicated fan of white peaks, we will take you to your kind of paradise ☀️❄️Find your ideal winter getaway match for a great price now: https://t.co/r5nAePoEXM
Book 💻 02.11.2021-10.11.2021
Travel ✈️ 16.11.2021-26.03.2022 https://t.co/tflC96SQ34
@thomas_boon It all makes sense now... 😎🇦🇪
@BrunoPint041 Enjoy the flights and see you on board with us some time in the future! ♥️
@vaneiks Could this be the right emoji then? 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿😉
@vaneiks We don't know why, but that curling emoji gives us a hint about Canada! Are we right? 🇨🇦
@BrunoPint041 Alright, so let's translate it - you are going from Spain to Portugal, and most probably - Lisbon? 🤔🙃
@AFeldmane Could this be Dubai? 😎
@MareksMh Wonderful! Hope you will enjoy it as much as we do!
@MareksMh Is your destination Barcelona? 😊⚽️
@thomas_boon As United States just have opened up, could this be your destination? 🤔
@AivarsTennisLV Well played, well played! 😁🇱🇻🇱🇻🇱🇻 https://t.co/f49Nf0R4mu
@m_sanija Volcano is a popular one today, but pizza would sway us for the choice as... Italy! https://t.co/xU2YzwFbHj
@AivarsTennisLV We cannot decide which one of these might be the correct one - either 🇫🇮 or 🇸🇪? 🤔

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@ZandaBorga It only took us 2 additional tweets but we got there in the end - Stavanger is your next destination!
Apologies for the indirect options during the winter season, however we cannot wait to get back there next March!
@ZandaBorga Could this be the capital of Norway - Oslo?
@GGarbincius Oh, now we rollin'! Does this destination country reaaally (like really) love the orange colour? 🇳🇱😊
@M_Goldbergs House and the bed is always a wonderful destination choice! 😍😴
@ZandaBorga This will be a WILD guess, but we think this might be Iceland? 🇮🇸 At least, based by the everchanging weather there!
@dzhizes Well, if that spaghetti will let us down... but we will go for Italy? 🙃
